overview: The emperor was ruled by the high-ranking Weiyan, and the imperial power was in name only. There is a confidant named Xian Rabbit next to the emperor. It was created by the immortal wizards of the past, and he has been the personal guardian of the emperor for generations. In addition, the fairy rabbit is the only one in the world who knows that only four people in the world can fight against Wei Yan, and these four people must work together to defeat Wei Yan.  　　The emperor ordered the fairy rabbit to find four people. As long as they are found, it is expected to stabilize the country and protect the world.
title: Fairy Tale
